评论详情: I truly expected to get this and most likely return it, I purchased as part of my Ren Faire costume and I was afraid it might seem a little over the top, be too big, or the sleeves just be huge and overwhelming. But I put this on and fell in love! My husband loved it too and thought it was super cool and unique! I’m very petite with absolutely no chest (I’d be a 30AA if it existed) and while I will wear a tank or sports bra cami under it I really could just wear a bra (or no bra if I was that kind of girl) because I can wrap around and tie in the back to make it look more modest. And because the sleeves kind of open at the elbow it really lets the material flow nicely and not get in the way. The branch/leaf pattern is stunning and looks so high quality and the brown/orange is the most perfect rustic fall color ever! Highly recommend and I’m definitely buying the other colors!
